author: majeed06

comments.content: Why encryption?! Are you afraid of losing the letter forms or font behavior?! Someone will decrypt it all.

Yes, I do afraid about both font and letter form’s security, and I know that someone will decrypt it as this process is coming since long.  
You know that making fonts Is a difficult process, if one person is ready to make it despite all difficulties and struggles, other person is ready to dismiss his all struggles.  
In spite this, I want to encrypt me fonts.  
There is a proverb in our language, that you have to protect yourself from gentlemen, not from thief.  
Anyway, what do you know about font encryption?

We encrypt our fonts by making them dynamic?!
